summary: User requested removal of @internal annotation from WorkflowExecutionDescription class to allow external access to WorkflowExecutionInfo and WorkflowExecutionStatus. The class contains critical execution state information but is currently blocked from public usage.
userImpact: Users cannot access workflow execution status details because the required class is marked as internal with no public alternative.
rootCause: WorkflowExecutionDescription class marked with @internal annotation, blocking external access to execution information.
proposedFix: Remove the @internal annotation from WorkflowExecutionDescription class to allow public access.
resolutionDetails: Maintainer roxblnfk agreed to remove the annotation in the next minor release.
keyQuote: Feel free to use this property, I'll remove the annotation in the next minor release.
